GV05agsas_1u:5: oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemākṣabhiryajatrāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:8: svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:9: svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu //
GV05agsas_1u:13: prajñānāṃśupratānaiḥ sthiracaranikaravyāpibhir vyāpya lokān bhuktvā bhogānsthaviṣṭhānpunarapi dhiṣaṇodbhāsitānkāmajanyān /
GV05agsas_1u:14: pītvā sarvān viśeṣān svapiti madhurabhuṅ māyayā bhojayanno māyāsaṃkhyāturīyaṃ paramamṛtamajaṃ brahma yattannato 'smi //1//
GV05agsas_1u:15: yo viśvātmā vidhijaviṣayān prāśya bhogān sthaviṣṭhān paścāc cānyān svamativibhavāñ jyotiṣā svena sūkṣmān /
GV05agsas_1u:16: sarvān etān punar api śanaiḥ svātmani sthāpayitvā hitvā sarvānviśeṣānvigataguṇagaṇaḥ pātvasau nasturīyaḥ //2//
GV05agsas_1u:21: yānyeva tu vedānte sambandhābhidheya prayojanāni tānyeveha bhavitumarhanti /
GV05agsas_1u:23: tatra prayojanavat sādhanābhivyañjakatvenābhidheyasambaddhaṃ śāstraṃ pāramparyeṇa viśiṣṭasaṃbandhābhidheyaprayojanavad bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:24: kiṃ punas tat prayojanam ity ucyate rogārtasyaiva roganivṛttau svasthatā /
GV05agsas_1u:27: dvaitaprapañcasyāvidyākṛtatvād vidyayā tad upaśamaḥ syād iti brahmavidyāprakāśanāyāsya ārambhaḥ kriyate /
GV05agsas_1u:29: 14) “yatra vānyad iva syāt tatrānyo 'nyat paśyed anyo 'nyad vijānīyāt“(bṛ.u 4 / 3 /
GV05agsas_1u:30: 31) “yatra vāsya sarvam ātmaivābhūt tat kena kaṃ paśyet kena kaṃ vijānīyāt“(bṛ.u 2 / 4 /
GV05agsas_1u:32: tatra tāvad oṃkāranirṇayāya prathamaṃ prakaraṇam āgamapradhānām ātmatattvapratipatty upāyabhūtam /
GV05agsas_1u:33: yasya dvaitaprapañcasyopaśame 'dvaitapratipattī rajjvām iva sarpādivikalpa upaśame rajjutattvapratipattis tasya dvaitasya hetuto vaitathyapratipādanāya dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:34: tathādvaitasyāpi vaitathyaprasaṅgaprāptau yuktitas tathātvadarśanāya tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:35: advaitasya tathātvapratipattipakṣabhūtāni yāni vādāntarāṇyavaidikāni teṣām anyonyavirodhitvādatathārthatvena tadupapattibhir eva nirākaraṇāya caturthaṃ prakaraṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:36: kathaṃ puna oṃkāranirṇaya ātmatattvapratipatty upāyatvaṃ pratipadyata ity ucyate“oṃ ity etat“(ka.u 1 / 2 /
GV05agsas_1u:43: rajjur ādir iva sarpādivikalpasyāspado 'dvaya ātmā paramārthaḥ sanprāṇādivikalpasyāspado yathā tathā sarvo 'pi vākprapañcaḥ prāṇādy ātmavikalpaviṣaya oṃkāra eva /
GV05agsas_1u:45: oṃkāravikāraśabdābhidheyaś ca sarvaḥ prāṇādir ātmavikalpo 'bhidhānavyatirekeṇa nāsti /
GV05agsas_1u:47: 4) “tad asyedaṃ vācā tantyā nāmabhir dāmabhiḥ sarvaṃ sitam” “sarvaṃ hīdaṃ nāmāni“ity ādi śrutibhyaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:49: oṃ ity etad akṣaram idaṃ sarvaṃ tasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyad iti sarvam oṃkāra eva /
GV05agsas_1u:50: yac cānyat trikālātītaṃ tad apy oṃkāra eva // MandUp_1 //
GV05agsas_1u:52: oṃ ity etad akṣaram idaṃ sarvam iti /
GV05agsas_1u:53: yad idam arthajātam abhidheyabhūtaṃ tasyābhidhānāvyatirekād abhidhānasya ca oṃkārāvyatirekād oṃkāra evedaṃ sarvam /
GV05agsas_1u:54: paraṃ ca brahmābhidhānābhidheya upāyapūrvakam eva gamyata ity oṃkāra eva /
GV05agsas_1u:55: tasyaitasya parāpara brahmarūpasyākṣarasya oṃ ity etasyopavyākhyānam;
GV05agsas_1u:56: brahmapratipatty upāyatvād brahmasamīpatayā vispaṣṭaṃ prakathanam upavyākhyānaṃ prastutaṃ veditavyam iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:57: bhūtaṃ bhavadbhaviṣyad iti kālatrayaparicchedyaṃ yat tad apy oṃkāra evoktanyāyataḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:58: yac cānyat trikālātītaṃ kāryādhigamyaṃ kālāparicchedyamavyākṛtādi tad apy oṃkāra eva //1//
GV05agsas_1u:61: oṃ ity etad akṣaram idaṃ sarvam ity ādy abhidhānaprādhānyena nirdiṣṭasya puno 'bhidheyaprādhānyena nirdeśo 'bhidhānābhidheyayor ekatvapratipatty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:62: itaro 'thā hy abhidhānatantrābhidheyapratipattir ity abhidheyasyābhidhānatvaṃ gauṇām ity āśaṅkā syāt /
GV05agsas_1u:63: ekatvapratipatteś ca prayojanam abhidhānābhidheyayor ekenaiva prayatnena yugapatpravilāparyastadvilakṣaṇaṃ brahma pratipadyeta iti /
GV05agsas_1u:64: tathā ca vakṣyati“pādā mātrā mātrāś ca pādāḥ” (mā.u.8) iti /
GV05agsas_1u:66: sarvaṃ hy etad brahmāyam ātmā brahma so 'yam ātmā catuṣpāt // MandUp_2 //
GV05agsas_1u:69: sarvaṃ yad uktam oṃkāramātram iti tadetad brahma /
GV05agsas_1u:70: tac ca brahma parokṣābhihitaṃ pratyakṣato viśeṣeṇa nirdiśatyayamātmā brahmeti /
GV05agsas_1u:71: ayam iti catuṣpātvena pravibhajyamānaṃ pratyagātmatayābhinayena nirdiśati ayam ātmeti /
GV05agsas_1u:72: so 'yamātma oṃkārābhidheyaḥ parāparatvena vyavasthitaś catuṣpātkārṣāpaṇavan na gaur iveti /
GV05agsas_1u:73: trayāṇāṃ viśvādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvapravilāpanena turīyasya pratapattir iti karaṇasādhanaḥ pādaśabdaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:77: jāgaritasthāno bahiḥprajñaḥ saptāṅga ekonaviṃśatimukhaḥ sthūlabhug vaiśvānaraḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ // MandUp_3 //
GV05agsas_1u:80: bahiṣprajñaḥ svātmavyatirikte viṣaye prajñā sa bahiṣprajño bahir viṣaya eva prajñāvidyākṛtāv avabhāsata ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:81: tathā saptāṅgānyasya“tasya ha vaitasyātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāś cakṣurviśvarūpaḥ prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdoho bahulo vastir eva rayiḥ pṛthivy eva pādau” (chā.u.5 / 18 /
GV05agsas_1u:82: 2) ity agnihotrakalpanāśeṣatvenāhavanīyo 'gnir asya mukhatvenokta ity evaṃ saptāṅgāni yasya sa saptāṅgaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:83: tathaikonaviṃśatir mukhāny asya buddhīndriyāṇi karmendriyāṇi ca daśa vāyavaś ca prāṇādayaḥpañca
GV05agsas_1u:84: mano buddhirahaṅkāraccittam iti mukhānīva mukhāni tāny upalabdhidvārāṇityarthaḥ sa
GV05agsas_1u:85: evaṃ viśiṣṭo vaiśvānaro yathoktair dvāraiḥ śabdādīn sthūlān viṣayān bhuṅkta iti sthūlabhuk /
GV05agsas_1u:87: yad vā viśvaś cāsau naraś ceti viśvānaraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:91: katham ayamātmā brahmeti pratyagātmano 'sya catuṣpāttve prakṛte dyulokādīnāṃ mūrdhādyaṅgatvam iti /
GV05agsas_1u:95: sarvabhūtasthaś cātmaiko dṛṣṭaḥ syāt sarvabhūtāni cātmani /
GV05agsas_1u:98: anyathā hi svadehaparicchinna eva pratyāgātmā sāṃkhyādibhir iva dṛṣṭaḥ syāt tathā ca satyadvaitam iti śrutikṛto viśeṣo na syāt sāṃkhyādidarśanenāviśeṣāt
GV05agsas_1u:100: ato yuktam evāsyādhyātmikasya piṇḍātmano dyulokādy aṅgatvena virāḍātmanādhidaivikenaikatvam abhipretya saptāṅgatvavacanam /
GV05agsas_1u:104: uktaṃ caitan madhubrāhmaṇe“yaś cāyam asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ tejomayo 'mṛtamayaḥ puruṣo yac cāyam adhyātmam“(bṛ.u.2 / 5 / 1) ityādi /
GV05agsas_1u:105: suṣuptāvyākṛtayaḥ sa tv ekatvaṃ siddham eva nirviśeṣatvāt /
GV05agsas_1u:106: evaṃ ca satyetat siddhaṃ bhaviṣyati sarvadvaita upaśame cādvaitam iti //3//
GV05agsas_1u:108: svaprasthāno 'ntaḥprajñaḥ saptāṅga ekonaviṃśatimukhaḥ praviviktabhuktaijaso dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // MandUp_4 //
GV05agsas_1u:111: jāgratprajñānekasādhanā bahir viṣaya evāvabhāsamānā manaḥspandanamātrā satī tathābhūtaṃ saṃskāraṃ manasyādhatte /
GV05agsas_1u:112: tan manas tathā saṃskṛtaṃ citrita iva paṭo bāhyasādhanān anapekṣam avidyākāmakarmabhiḥ preryamāṇaṃ jāgradvadavabhāsate /
GV05agsas_1u:113: tathā coktam“asya lokasya sarvāvato mātrām apādāya“(bṛ.u.4 / 3 / 9) iti /
GV05agsas_1u:115: 2) iti prastutya“atraiṣa devaḥ svapne mahimānam anubhavati“(pra.u.4 /
GV05agsas_1u:117: indriyāpekṣayāntaḥsthatvān manasas tad vāsanārūpā ca svapne prajñā yasyātyantaḥprajñaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:118: viṣayaśūnyānāṃ prajñāyāṃ kevalaprakāśasvarūpāyāṃ viṣayitvena bhavatīti taijasaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:120: iha punaḥ kevalā vāsanāmātrā prajñā bhojyeti pravivikto bhoga iti /
GV05agsas_1u:124: darśanādarśanavṛttyas tatvāprabodhalakṣaṇasya svāpasya tulyatvāt suṣuptigrahaṇārthaṃ yatra supta ityādi viśeṣaṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:125: atha vā triṣv api sthāneṣu tattvāpratibodhalakṣaṇaḥ svāpo 'viśiṣṭa iti pūrvābhyāṃ suṣuptaṃ vibhajate
GV05agsas_1u:126: yatra supto na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati tat suṣuptam /
GV05agsas_1u:127: suṣuptasthāna ekībhūtaḥ prajñānaghana evāndamayo hy ānandabhukcetomukhaḥ prājñaḥ tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // MandUp_5 //
GV05agsas_1u:129: yatra yasmin sthāne kāle vā supto na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate /
GV05agsas_1u:130: na hi suṣupte pūrvayor ivānyathāgrahaṇalakṣaṇaṃ svapnadarśanaṃ kāmo vā kaścana vidyane /
GV05agsas_1u:132: sthānadvayapravibhaktaṃ manaḥ spanditaṃ dvaitajātaṃ tathā rūpāparityāgenāvivekāpannaṃ naiśatamograstamivāhaḥ saprapañcamekībhūtam ity ucyate
GV05agsas_1u:133: ata eva svapnajāgran manaḥspandanāni prajñānāni ghanībhūtānīva seyamavasthāvivekarūpatvāt prajñānaghanocyate /
GV05agsas_1u:134: yathā rātrau naiśena tamasā vibhajyamānaṃ sarvaṃ ghanam iva tadvat prajñānaghana eva /
GV05agsas_1u:137: yathā loke nirāyāsasthitaḥ sukhyānandabhugucyate 'tyantānāyāsarūpā hīyaṃ sthitiranenānubhūyata ity ānandabhuk“eṣo 'sya parama ānandaḥ“(bṛ.u.4 / 3 / 32) iti śruteḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:139: bodhalakṣaṇaṃ vā ceto dvāraṃ mukham asya svapnādy āgamanaṃ pratīti cetomukhaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:142: athavā prajñaptimātram asyaivāsādhāraṇaṃ rūpam iti prājña itarayor viśiṣṭam api vijñānam asti /
GV05agsas_1u:145: eṣaḥ sarveśvara eṣa sarvajña eṣo 'ntaryāmy eṣa yoniḥ sarvasya prabhavāpyayau hi bhūtānām // MandUp_6 //
GV05agsas_1u:147: eṣa hi svarūpāvasthaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sādhidaivikasya bhedajātasya sarvasyeśitā naitasmāj jātyantarabhūto 'nyeṣām iva /
GV05agsas_1u:149: ayam eva hi sarvasya sarvabhedāvastho jñātetyeṣa sarvajñaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:150: eṣo 'ntaryāmy antaranupraviśya sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ niyantāpy eṣa eva /
GV05agsas_1u:151: ata eva yathoktaṃ sabhedaṃ jagatprasūyata ity eṣa yoniḥ sarvasya /
GV05agsas_1u:152: yata evaṃ prabhavaś cāpi yaś ca prabhavāpyayau hi bhūtānām eṣa eva //6// ==========================================================================
GV05agsas_1u:156: bahiḥprajño vibhuḥ viśvo hy antaḥprajñas tu taijasaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:157: ghanaprajñaḥ tathā prājña eka eva tridhā smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_1.1 //
GV05agsas_1u:159: paryāyeṇa tristhānatvāt sa aham iti smṛtyā pratisandhānāc ca sthānatrayavyatiriktamekatvaṃ śuddhatvam asaṅgatvaṃ ca siddham ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:162: jāgaritāvasthāyām eva viśvādīnāṃ trayāṇām anubhavapradarśanārtho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:163: dakṣiṇākṣimukhe viśvo manasy antas tu taijasaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:164: ākāśe ca hṛdi prājñas tridhā dehe vyavasthitaḥ // MandUpK_1.2 //
GV05agsas_1u:165: dakṣiṇam akṣyeva mukhaṃ tasminprādhānyena draṣṭā sthūlānāṃ viśvo 'nubhūyate“indho ha vai nāmaiṣa yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣaḥ” /
GV05agsas_1u:168: ādityāntargato vairāja ātmā cakṣuṣi ca draṣṭaikaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:176: “sarveṣu karaṇeṣv aviśeṣe 'pi dakṣiṇākṣaṇy upalabdhipāṭavadarśanāt tatra viśeṣeṇa nirdeśo viśvasya /
GV05agsas_1u:177: dakṣiṇākṣigato rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā nimīlitākṣas tadeva smaran manasyantaḥ svapna iva tadeva vāsanārūpābhivyaktaṃ paśyati /
GV05agsas_1u:179: ato manasyantas tu taijaso 'pi viśva eva /
GV05agsas_1u:180: ākāśe ca hṛdi smaraṇākhyavyāpāroparame prājña ekībhūto ghanaprajña eva bhavati manovyāpārābhāvāt /
GV05agsas_1u:181: darśanasmaraṇa eva hi manaḥspandite tadabhāve hṛdyevāviśeṣeṇa prāṇātmanāvasthānam /
GV05agsas_1u:182: “prāṇo hy evaitān sarvān saṃvṛṅkte“(chā.4 / 3 / 3) iti śruteḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:191: yadyapi prāṇābhimāne sati vyākṛtataiva prāṇasya tathāpi piṇḍaparicchinnaviśeṣābhimānanirodhaḥ prāṇobhavatītyavyākṛta eva prāṇaḥ suṣupte paricchinnābhimānavatām
GV05agsas_1u:192: yathā prāṇalaye paricchinnābhimānināṃ prāṇo 'vyākṛtas tathā prāṇābhimānino 'py aviśeṣāpattāvavyākṛtatā samānā prasavabījātmakatvaṃ ca tadadhyakṣaś caiko 'vyākṛtāvasthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:193: paricchinnābhimāninām adhyakṣāṇāṃ ca tena ekatvam iti pūrvoktaṃ viśeṣaṇamekībhūta prajñānaghana ityādyupapantam /
GV05agsas_1u:200: yady api tadbrahma prāṇaśabdavācyaṃ tatra tathāpi jīvaprasavabījātmakatvam apiratyajya eva prāṇaśabdatvaṃ sataḥ sacchabdavācyatā ca /
GV05agsas_1u:201: yadi hi nirbījarūpaṃ vivakṣitaṃ brahmābhaviṣyat“neti neti“(bṛ.u.4.4.2.24.5.15)
GV05agsas_1u:205: nirbījatayaiva cet sati līnānāṃ suṣuptapralayayoḥ punarutthānānupapattiḥ syāt /
GV05agsas_1u:208: tasmāt sa bījatvābhyupagamena eva sataḥ prāṇatvavyapadeśaḥ sarvaśrutiṣu ca kāraṇatvavyapadeśaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:214: tāṃ bījāvasthāṃ tasyaiva prājñaśabdavācyasya turīyatvena dehādisaṃbandhajāgradādirahitāṃ pāramārthikīṃ pṛthagvakṣyati /
GV05agsas_1u:215: bījāvasthāpi na kiñcidavediṣamityutthitasya pratyayadarśanāddehe 'nubhūyata eveti tridhā dehe vyavasthitety ucyate //2//
GV05agsas_1u:217: viśvaḥ hi sthūlabhuṅ nityaṃ taijasaḥ praviviktabhuk /
GV05agsas_1u:218: ānandabhuk tathā prājñastridhā bhogaṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_1.3 //
GV05agsas_1u:219: sthūlaṃ tarpayate viśvaṃ praviviktaṃ tu taijasam /
GV05agsas_1u:220: ānandaś ca tathā prājñaṃ tridhā tṛptiṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_1.4 //
GV05agsas_1u:223: triṣu dhāmasu yadbhojyaṃ bhoktā yaś ca prakīrtitaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:224: vadaitadubhayaṃ yas tu sa bhuñjāno na lipyate // MandUpK_1.5 //
GV05agsas_1u:225: triṣu dhāmasu jāgradādiṣu sthūlapraviviktānandākhyaṃ bhojyam ekaṃ tridhābhūtam /
GV05agsas_1u:226: yaś ca viśvataijasaprājñākhyo bhoktaikaḥ sa aham ityekatvenapratisaṃdhānāddraṣṭutvāviśeṣāc ca prakīrtitaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:227: yo vedaitadubhayaṃ bhojyabhoktṛtayānekadhā bhinnaṃ sa bhuñjāno na lipyate /
GV05agsas_1u:229: na hi yasya yo viṣayaḥ sa tena hīyate vardhate vā na hy agniḥ svaviṣayaṃ dagdhvā kāṣṭhādi tadvat //5//
GV05agsas_1u:232: sarvaṃ janayati prāṇaś ceto 'ṃśūn puruṣaḥ pṛthak // MandUpK_1.6 //
GV05agsas_1u:233: satāṃ vidyamānānāṃ svenāvidyākṛtanāmarūpamāyāsvarūpeṇa sarvabhāvānāṃ viśvataijasaprājñabhedānāṃ prabhavotpattiḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:234: vakṣyati ca“vandhyāputro na tattvena māyayā vāpi jāyate“iti /
GV05agsas_1u:235: yadi hy asatām eva janma syād brahmaṇo 'vyavahāryasya grahaṇadvārābhāvādasatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:236: dṛṣṭaṃ ca rajjusarpādīnām avidyākṛtamāyābījotpannānāṃ rajjvādy ātmanā satvam /
GV05agsas_1u:237: na hi nirāspadā rajjusarpamṛgatṛṣṇikādayaḥ kvacid upalabhyante kenacit /
GV05agsas_1u:238: yathā rajjvāṃ prāksarpotpatte rajjvātmanāṃ sarpaḥ sanneva āsīd evaṃ sarvabhāvānām utpatteḥ prākprāṇabījātmanaiva satvam /
GV05agsas_1u:241: sarvaṃ janayati prāṇaścetoṃ'śūnaṃśava iva raveś cidātmakasya puruṣasya cetorūpā jalārkasamāḥ
GV05agsas_1u:243: pṛthag viṣayabhāvavilakṣaṇān agniviṣphuliṅgavat salakṣaṇāñjalārkavac ca jīvalakṣaṇāṃstvitarān
GV05agsas_1u:248: vibhūtiṃ prasavaṃ tv anye manyante sṛṣṭicintakāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:250: vibhūtir vistāreśvarasya sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭicintakā manyante na tu paramārthacintakānāṃ sṛṣṭav ādara ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:252: na hi māyāvinaṃ sūtram ākāśe nikṣipya tena sāyudham āruhya cakṣurgocaratām atītya
GV05agsas_1u:253: yuddhena khaṇḍaśaśchinnaṃ patitaṃ punarutthitaṃ ca paśyatāṃ tat kṛtaṃ māyādisatatvacintāyām ādaro bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:254: tathaivāyaṃ māyāvinaḥ sūtraprasāraṇasamaḥ suṣuptasvapnādivikāsastadārūḍhamayāvisamaś ca tatsthaḥ prājñataijasādiḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:255: sūtratadārūḍhābhyāmanyaḥ paramārthamāyāvī sa eva bhūmiṣṭho māyāchanno 'dṛśyamāna eva sthito yathā tathā turīyākhyaṃ paramārthatattvam /
GV05agsas_1u:256: atas tac cintāyām evādaro mumukṣūṇāmāryāṇāṃ na niṣprayojanāyāṃ sṛṣṭav ādara ityataḥ sṛṣṭicintakānām evaite vikalpety āha svapnamāyāsarūpeti
GV05agsas_1u:259: icchāmātraṃ prabhoḥ sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭau viniścitāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:260: kālāt prasūtiṃ bhūtānāṃ manyante kālacintakāḥ // MandUpK_1.8 //
GV05agsas_1u:261: icchāmātraṃ prabhoḥ satyasaṃkalpatvāt sṛṣṭir ghaṭādiḥ saṃkalpanāmātraṃ na saṃkalpanātiriktam /
GV05agsas_1u:264: bhogārthaṃ sṛṣṭir iti anye krīḍārtham iti cāpare /
GV05agsas_1u:265: devasyaiṣa svabhāvo 'yam āptakāmasya kā spṛhā // MandUpK_1.9 //
GV05agsas_1u:266: bhogārthaṃ krīḍārtham iti cānye sṛṣṭiṃ manyante /
GV05agsas_1u:267: anayoḥ pakṣayor dūṣaṇaṃ devasyaiṣa svabhāvo 'yam iti devasya svabhāvapakṣam āśritya sarveṣāṃ vā pakṣāṇām āptakāmasya kā spṛheti /
GV05agsas_1u:268: na hi rajjvādīnām avidyāsvabhāvavyatirekeṇa sarpādyābhāsatve kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum //9//
GV05agsas_1u:270: caturthaḥ pādaḥ kramaprāpto vaktavya ity āhanāntaḥprajñam ityādinā /
GV05agsas_1u:271: sarvaśabdapravṛttinimittaśūnyatvāt tasya śabdānabhidheyatvam iti viśeṣapratiṣedhena eva ca turīyaṃ nirdidikṣati /
GV05agsas_1u:273: na mithyāvikalpasya nirnimittatvānupapatter na hi rajatasarpapuruṣamṛgatṛṣṇikādivikalpāḥ śuktikārajjusthāṇur ūṣarādi vyatirekeṇāvastvāspadāḥ śakyāḥ kalpayitum /
GV05agsas_1u:274: evaṃ tarhi prāṇādisarvavikalpāspadatvāt turīyasya śabdavācyatvam iti na pratiṣedhaiḥ pratyāyyatvam /
GV05agsas_1u:278: nāpi pramāṇāntaraviṣayatvaṃ svarūpeṇa gavādivad ātmano nirupādhikatvād /
GV05agsas_1u:286: na ca turīyasyā'tmatvānavagame kāraṇamasti sarvopaniṣadāṃ tādarthyenopakṣayāt /
GV05agsas_1u:291: so 'yam ātmā paramārthāparamārtharūpaś catuṣpāda ity uktas tasyāparamārtharūpam avidyākṛtaṃ rajjusarpādisamam uktaṃ pādatrayalakṣaṇaṃ bījāṅkurasthānīyam
GV05agsas_1u:292: athedānīṃ bījātmakaṃ paramārthasvarūpaṃ rajjusthānīyaṃ sarpādisthānīyoktasthānatrayānirākaraṇenāha nāntaḥ prajñamityādi /
GV05agsas_1u:293: nāntaḥprajñaṃ na bahiḥprajñaṃ nobhayataḥprajñaṃ na prajñānaghanaṃ na prajñaṃ nāprajñam /
GV05agsas_1u:294: adṛṣṭam avyavahāryam agrāhyam alakṣaṇam acintyam avyapadeśyam ekātmapratyayasāraṃ prapañcopaśamaṃ śāntaṃ śivam advaitaṃ caturthaṃ manyante /
GV05agsas_1u:297: nanv ātmanaś catuṣpātvaṃ pratijñāya prādatrayakathanena eva caturthasyāntaḥ prajñādibhyo anyatve siddhe nāntaḥ prajña ityādi pratiṣedho 'narthakaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:298: na sarpādivikalpapratiṣedhena eva rajjusvarūpapratipattivattryavasthasya evātmanas turīyatvena pratipipādayiṣitatvāt /
GV05agsas_1u:300: yadi hi tryavasthātmavilakṣaṇaṃ turīyam anyat tatpratipattidvārābhāvācchāstropadeśānarthakyaṃ śūnyatāpattir vā /
GV05agsas_1u:301: rajjur iva sarpādibhirvikalpyamānā sthānatraye 'py ātmaika evāntaḥ prajñāditvena
GV05agsas_1u:303: parisamāptam iti turīyādhigame pramāṇāntaraṃ sādhanāntaraṃ vā ma mṛgyam /
GV05agsas_1u:304: rajjusarpavivekasamakāla iva rajjvāṃ sarpanivṛttiphale sati rajjvadhigayasya /
GV05agsas_1u:305: yeṣāṃ punas tamo 'panayavyatirekeṇa ghaṭādhigame pramāṇaṃ vyāpriyate teṣāṃ chedyāvayavasambandhaviyogavyatirekeṇāny anyatarāvayave 'picchidirvyā priyata ity uktaṃ syāt /
GV05agsas_1u:308: tathā nāntarīyakaṃ ghaṭavijñānaṃ na tat pramāṇaphalam /
GV05agsas_1u:309: na ca tadvad apy ātmany adhyāropitāntaḥ prajñatvādivivekakaraṇe pravṛttasya pratiṣedhavijñānapramāṇasyānupāditsitāntaḥ prajñatvadinivṛttivyatirekeṇa turīye vyāpāra upapattiḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:311: tathā ca vakṣyati“jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate“(māṇḍū.kā.1.18) iti /
GV05agsas_1u:314: tasmāt pratiṣedhavijñānapramāṇavyāpārasamakālair vātmany adhyāropitāntaḥ prajñatvādyanarthānivṛttir iti siddham /
GV05agsas_1u:315: nāntaḥ prajñam iti taijasapratiṣedho na bahiṣprajñam iti viśvapratiṣedhaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:320: kathaṃ punarantaḥ prajñatvādīnām ātmani gamyamānānāṃ rajjvādau sarpādivat pratiṣedhādasatvaṃ gamyata ity ucyate /
GV05agsas_1u:321: jñasvarūpāviśeṣe 'pītaretaravyabhicārādrajjvādāv iva sarpadhārādivikalpita bhedavat sarvatrāvyabhicārājjñasvarūpasya satyatvam /
GV05agsas_1u:323: suṣuptasyānubhūyamānatvāt“na hi vijñātur vijñāter viparalopo vidyate“(bṛ.u.4.3.30) iti śruteḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:327: alakṣaṇamaliṅgam ity etad ananumey ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:330: ekātmapratyayasāraṃ jāgradādisthāneṣv eko 'yam ātmetyavyabhicārī yaḥ pratyayastenānusaraṇīyam /
GV05agsas_1u:331: athavaika ātmapratyayaḥ sāraṃ pramāṇaṃ yasya turīyasyādhigame tat turīyamekātmapratyayasāram /
GV05agsas_1u:335: ata eva śāntamavikriyaṃ śivaṃ yato 'dvaitaṃ bhedavikalparahitam /
GV05agsas_1u:337: sa ātmā sa vijñeya iti pratīyamānasarpabhūchidradaṇḍādivyatiriktā yathā rajjus tathā tattvamasītyādivākyārtha ātmā“adṛṣṭo draṣṭā“(bṛ.u.3.7.23)
GV05agsas_1u:340: sa vijñeya iti bhūtapūrvagatyā jñāte dvaitābhāvaḥ //7//
GV05agsas_1u:344: advaitaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ devās turyo vibhuḥ smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_1.10 //
GV05agsas_1u:345: prājñataijasaviśvalakṣaṇānāṃ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ nivṛtte īśānas turīya ātmā /
GV05agsas_1u:346: īśāna ity asya vyākhyānaṃ prabhur iti /
GV05agsas_1u:349: avyayo na vyeti svarūpān na vyabhicaratīti yāvat /
GV05agsas_1u:351: yasmād advaitaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ rajjusarpavanmṛṣātvāt sa eṣa devo dyotanāt turīyaś caturtho vibhuvyāpī smṛtaḥ //10//
GV05agsas_1u:355: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhas tu dvau tau turye na sidhyataḥ // MandUpK_1.11 //
GV05agsas_1u:358: tattvāgrahaṇān yathāgrahaṇābhyāṃ bījaphalabhāvābhyāṃ tau yathoktau viśvataijasau baddhau saṃgṛhītāviṣyete /
GV05agsas_1u:360: tattvāpratibodhamātram eva hi bījaṃ prājñatve nimittam /
GV05agsas_1u:361: tato dvau tau bījaphalabhāvau tatvāgrahaṇān yathā grahaṇe turye na sidhyato na vidyete na sambhavata ity arthaḥ //11//
GV05agsas_1u:363: kathaṃ punaḥ kāraṇabaddhatvaṃ prājñasya turīye vā tattvāgrahaṇān yathāgrahaṇalakṣaṇau bandhau na sidhyata iti /
GV05agsas_1u:365: nātmānaṃ na parāś caiva na satyaṃ na api cānṛtam /
GV05agsas_1u:366: prājñaḥ kiñcana saṃvetti turyaṃ tat sarvadṛk sadā // MandUpK_1.12 //
GV05agsas_1u:367: ātmavilakṣaṇam avidyābījaprasūtaṃ bāhyaṃ dvaitaṃ prājño na kiñcana saṃvetti tathā viśvataijasau /
GV05agsas_1u:368: tataś cāsau tattvāgrahaṇena tamasānyathā grahaṇabījabhūtena baddho bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:369: yasmāt turīyaṃ tatsarvadṛksadā turīyādanyasyābhāvāt sarvadā sadaivaiti sarvaṃ ca tadddṛkceti sarvadṛk tasmān na tattvāgrahaṇalakṣaṇaṃ bījaṃ tatra /
GV05agsas_1u:370: tat prasūtasyānyathāgrahaṇasyāpyataivābhāvo na hi savitari sadā prākāśātmake tad viruddham aprakāśanam anyathā prakāśanaṃ vā sambhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:373: atha vā jāgratsvapnayoḥ sarvabhūtāvasthaḥ sarvavastudṛgābhāsas turīyaiveti sarvadṛksadā“nānyad ato 'sti draṣṭṛ“(bṛ.u.3.8.11)
GV05agsas_1u:377: bījanidrāyutaḥ prājñaḥ sā ca turye na vidyate // MandUpK_1.13 //
GV05agsas_1u:379: kathaṃ dvaitāgrahaṇasya tulyatvāt kāraṇabaddhatvaṃ prājñasya eva na turīyasyeti prāptāśaṅkā nivartyate /
GV05agsas_1u:381: sa eva ca viśeṣapratibodhaprasavasya bījaṃ sā bījanidrā tayā yutaḥ prājñaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:382: sadā dṛksvabhāvatvāt tattvāpratibodhalakṣaṇā nidrā turīye na vidyate 'to na kāraṇabandhastasminnityābhiprāyaḥ //13//
GV05agsas_1u:385: na nidrāṃ naiva ca svapnaṃ turye paśyanti niścitaḥ // MandUpK_1.14 //
GV05agsas_1u:390: prājñas tu svapnavarjitakevalaiva nidrayā yuta iti kāraṇabaddha ity uktam /
GV05agsas_1u:391: nobhayaṃ paśyanti turīye niścitā brahmavido viruddhatvāt savitarīva tamaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:392: ato na kāryakāraṇabaddha ity uktas turīyaḥ //14//
GV05agsas_1u:395: anyathā gṛhṇataḥ svapno nidrā tattvam ajānataḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:396: viparyāse tayoḥ kṣīṇe turīyaṃ padam aśnute // MandUpK_1.15 //
GV05agsas_1u:397: svapnajāgaritayoranyathā rajvāṃ sarpa iva gṛhṇatastattvaṃ svapno bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:400: anyathāgrahaṇaprādhānyāc ca guṇabhūtā nidreti tasmin viparyāsaḥ svapnaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:401: tṛtīye tu sthānetattvājñānalakṣaṇā nidraiva kevalā viparyāsaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:402: atas tayoḥ kāryakāraṇasthānayor anyathāgrahaṇāgrahaṇalakṣaṇaviparyāse kāryakāraṇabandharūpe paramārthatatvapritabodhataḥ kṣīṇe turīyaṃ padam aśnute /
GV05agsas_1u:403: tadobhayalakṣaṇaṃ bandharūpaṃ tatrāpaśyaṃs turīye niścito bhavatīty arthaḥ //15//
GV05agsas_1u:406: ajam anidram asvapnam advaitaṃ budhyate tadā // MandUpK_1.16 //
GV05agsas_1u:407: yo 'yaṃ saṃsārī jīvaḥ sobhayalakṣaṇena tattvāpratibodharūpeṇa bījātmanānyathāgrahaṇalakṣaṇena
GV05agsas_1u:408: cānādikālapravṛttena māyālakṣaṇena svapnena mamāyaṃ pitā putro 'yaṃ naptā kṣetraṃ
GV05agsas_1u:409: paśavo 'ham eṣāṃ svāmī sukhī duḥkhī kṣayito 'ham anena vardhitaś cānena ity evaṃprakārān
GV05agsas_1u:411: yadā vedāntārthatattvābhijñena paramakāruṇikena guruṇā nāsyaivaṃ tvaṃ hetuphalātmakaḥ kiṃ tu tattvam asīti pratibodhyamānas tadaivaṃ pratibudhyate
GV05agsas_1u:412: katham? nāsmin bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ vā janmādibhāvavikāro 'sty ato 'jaṃ sabāhyābhyantarasarvabhāvikāravarjitam ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:413: yasmāj janmādikāraṇabhūtaṃ nāsminn avidyātamobījaṃ nidrā vidyata ity anidram /
GV05agsas_1u:414: anidraṃ hi tat turīyamata evāsvapnaṃ tan nimittatvād anyathāgrahaṇasya /
GV05agsas_1u:415: yasmāc cānidram asvapnaṃ tasmād ajam advaitaṃ turīyam ātmānaṃ budhyate tadā //16//
GV05agsas_1u:417: prapañcanivṛtyā cet pratibudhyate 'nivṛtte prapañce katham advaitam ity ucyate
GV05agsas_1u:418: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:419: māyāmātram idaṃ dvaitam advaitaṃ paramārthataḥ // MandUpK_1.17 //
GV05agsas_1u:420: satyam avaṃ syāt prapañco yadi vidyeta rajjvāṃ sarpa iva kalpitatvān na tu sa vidyate /
GV05agsas_1u:422: na hi rajjvāṃ bhrāntibuddhyā kalpitaḥ sarpo vidyamānaḥ sanvivekato nivṛttaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:423: naiva māyā māyāvinā prayuktā tad darśināṃ cakṣurbandhāpagame vidyamānā satī nivṛttā /
GV05agsas_1u:424: tathedaṃ prapañcākhyaṃ māyāmātraṃ dvaitaṃ rajjuvan māyāvivaccadvaitaṃ paramārthatas tasmān na kaścit prapañcaḥ pravṛtto nivṛtto vāstītīty abhiprāyaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:426: nanu śāstā śāstraṃ śiṣya iti vikalpaḥ kathaṃ nivartata ity ucyate
GV05agsas_1u:428: upadeśād ayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate // MandUpK_1.18 //
GV05agsas_1u:429: vikalpo vinivarteta yadi kenacit kalpitaḥ syāt /
GV05agsas_1u:430: yathāyaṃ prapañco māyārajjusarpavat tathāyaṃ śiṣyādi bhedavikalpo 'pi prāk pratibodhādevopadeśanimitto 'topadeśādayaṃ vādaḥ śiṣyaḥ śāstā śāstram iti /
GV05agsas_1u:431: upadeśakārye tu jñāne nirvṛtte jñāte paramārthatatve dvaitaṃ na vidyate //18//
GV05agsas_1u:435: adhimātraṃ pādā mātrā mātrāśca pādā akāra ukāro makāra iti // MandUp_8 //
GV05agsas_1u:438: kiṃ punas tadakṣaram ity āha oṃkāraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:439: so 'yam oṃkāraḥ pādaśaḥ pravibhajyamāno 'dhimātraṃ mātrām adhikṛtya vartata ity adhimātram /
GV05agsas_1u:440: katham? ātmano ye pādāsta oṃkārasya mātrāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:444: jāgaritasthāno vaiśvānaraḥ akāraḥ prathamā mātrāpterādimattvād vā /
GV05agsas_1u:445: āpnoti ha vai sarvān kāmān ādiś ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda // MandUp_9 //
GV05agsas_1u:447: jāgaritasthāno vaiśvānaro yaḥ sa oṃkārasyākāraḥ prathamā mātrā /
GV05agsas_1u:448: kena sāmānyenety āha āpterāptirvyāptikāreṇa sarvā vāg vyāptā /
GV05agsas_1u:450: tathā vaiśvānareṇa jagat“tasya ha vaitasyātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāḥ“(chā.u.5 / 18 /
GV05agsas_1u:453: ādirasya vidyata ityādi madyathaivādimadakārākhyamakṣaraṃ tathaiva vaiśvānaras tasmād vā sāmānyād akāratvaṃ vaiśvānarasya /
GV05agsas_1u:454: tad ekatvavidaḥ phalam āha āpnoti ha vai sarvān kāmānādiḥ prathamaś ca bhavati mahatāṃ ya evaṃ veda yadoktam ekatvaṃ vedety arthaḥ //9//
GV05agsas_1u:456: svapnasthānas taijasa ukāro dvitīyā mātrotkarṣād ubhayatvād vā /
GV05agsas_1u:459: nāsyābrahmavit kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda // MandUp_10 //
GV05agsas_1u:460: svapnasthānas taijaso yaḥ sa oṃkārasyokāro dvitīyā mātrā /
GV05agsas_1u:462: akārād utkṛṣṭa iva hy ukāras tathā taijaso viśvād ubhayatvād akāramakārayor madhyasyokāras tathā viśvaprājñayor madhye taijaso 'tobhayabhāktvasāmānyāt
GV05agsas_1u:465: samānas tulyaś ca mitrapakṣasyaiva śatrupakṣāṇām apy apradveṣyo bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:466: abrahmavidasya kule na bhavati ya evaṃ veda //10//
GV05agsas_1u:468: suṣuptasthānaḥ prājño makāraḥ tṛtīyā mātrā miter apīter vā /
GV05agsas_1u:469: minoti ha vā idaṃ sarvam apītiś ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda // MandUp_11 //
GV05agsas_1u:470: suṣuptasthānaḥ prājño yaḥ sa oṃkārasya makāras tṛtīyā mātrā /
GV05agsas_1u:471: kena sāmānyenety āha sāmānyamidam atra mito 'mitirmānaṃ mīyata iva viśvataijasau prājñena pralayotpattyoḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:472: praveśanirgamābhyāṃ prastheneta yavās tathauṃkārasamāptau punaḥ prayoge ca praviśya nirgacchata ivākāroṃkārau makāre /
GV05agsas_1u:475: oṃkāra uccāraṇe hy antyākṣara ekībhūtāvivākāra oṃkārau /
GV05agsas_1u:477: ato vā sāmānyād ekatvaṃ prājñam akārayoḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:478: vidvatphalam āha minoti ha vedaṃ sarvaṃ jagad yāthātmyaṃ jānātīty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:479: apītiś ca jagat kāraṇātmā bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:484: mātrāsaṃpratipattau syād āptisāmānyam eva ca // MandUpK_1.19 //
GV05agsas_1u:485: viśvasyātvamakāramātratvaṃ yadā vivakṣyate tadāditvasāmānyamuktanyāyenotkaṭamudbhṛtaṃ dṛśyata ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:488: āptisāmānyam eva cotkaṭam ity anuvartate ca śabdāt //19//
GV05agsas_1u:491: mātrāsaṃpratipattau syād ubhayatvaṃ tathā vidham // MandUpK_1.20 //
GV05agsas_1u:492: taijasasyātvavijñānokāratvavivakṣāyāmutkarṣo dṛśyate sphuṭaṃ spaṣṭa ity artha ubhayatvaṃ ca sphuṭam eveti /
GV05agsas_1u:496: mātrāsaṃpratipattau tu layasāmānyam eva ca // MandUpK_1.21 //
GV05agsas_1u:497: makāratve prājñasya mitilayāvutkṛṣṭe sāmānya ity arthaḥ //21//
GV05agsas_1u:499: triṣu dhāmasu yat tulyaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetti niścitaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:500: sa pūjyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vandyaś caiva mahāmuniḥ // MandUpK_1.22 //
GV05agsas_1u:501: yathoktasthānatraye yastulyam uktaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetyavam evaitad iti niścito yaḥ sa pūjyo vandyaś ca brahmavilloke bhavati //22//
GV05agsas_1u:503: yathoktaiḥ sāmānyair ātmapādānāṃ mātrābhiḥ sahaikatvaṃ kṛtvā yathoktam oṃkāraṃ pratipadya yo dhyāyati tam
GV05agsas_1u:504: akāro nayate viśvam ukāraś cāpi taijasam /
GV05agsas_1u:505: makāraś ca punaḥ prājñaṃ nāmātre vidyate gatiḥ // MandUpK_1.23 //
GV05agsas_1u:507: akārālambanam oṃkāraṃ vidvān vaiśvānaro bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:511: kṣīṇe tu makāre bījabhāvakṣayādamātra oṃkāre gatir na vidyate kvacid ity arthaḥ //23//
GV05agsas_1u:515: saṃviśaty ātmanātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda // MandUp_12 //
GV05agsas_1u:516: amātro mātrā yasya nāsti sa amātra oṃkāraś caturthas turīya ātmaiva kevalo 'bhidhānābhidheyarūpayor avāṅmanasayoḥ kṣīṇatvād avyavahāryaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:517: prapañca upaśamaḥ śivo 'dvaitaḥ saṃvṛtta evaṃ yathokta vijñānavatā prayukta oṃkāras trimātras tripāda ātmaiva /
GV05agsas_1u:519: svaṃ pāramārthikam ātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda /
GV05agsas_1u:520: paramārthadarśī brahmavit tṛtīyaṃ bījabhāvaṃ dagdhvātmānaṃ praviṣṭa iti na puno jāyate turīyasyābījatvāt /
GV05agsas_1u:521: na hi rajjusarpayor viveke rajjvāṃ praviṣṭaḥ sarpo buddhisaṃskārāt punaḥ pūrvavattad vivekinām utthāsyati /
GV05agsas_1u:522: mandamadhyamadhiyāṃ tu pratipannasādhakabhāvānāṃ sanmārgagāmināṃ saṃnyāsināṃ mātrāṇāṃ
GV05agsas_1u:523: pādānāṃ ca kḷptasāmānyavidāṃ yathāvad upāsyamāna oṃkāro brahmapratipattaya ālambanī
GV05agsas_1u:524: bhavati tathā ca vakṣyati'āśramās trividhāḥ'(mā.kā.3.16) ityādi //12 //
GV05agsas_1u:528: oṃkāraṃ pādaśo vidyāt pādā mātrā na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:529: oṃkāraṃ pādaśo jñātvā na kiñcid api cintayet // MandUpK_1.24 //
GV05agsas_1u:530: yathoktaiḥ sāmānyaiḥ pādaiva mātrā mātrāś ca pādās tasmād oṃṅkāraṃ pādaśo vidyād ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:531: evam oṃkāre jñāte dṛṣṭārtham adṛṣṭārthaṃ vā na kiñcit prayojanaṃ cintayet kṛtārthatvād ityarthaḥ //24//
GV05agsas_1u:533: yuñjīta praṇave cetaḥ praṇavo brahma nirbhayam /
GV05agsas_1u:534: praṇave nityayuktasya na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // MandUpK_1.25 //
GV05agsas_1u:535: yuñjīta samādadhyādyathāvyākhyāte paramārtharūpe praṇave ceto manaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:537: na hi tatra sadā yuktasya bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit 'vidvān na bibheti kutaścana'(tai.u.2.9) iti śruteḥ //25//
GV05agsas_1u:539: praṇavo hy aparaṃ brahma praṇavaś ca paraḥ smṛtaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:542: paramārthatā kṣīṇeṣu mātrāpādeṣu para evātmā brahmeti na pūrvaṃ kāraṇam asya vidyata ity apūrvaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:543: nāsyāntaraṃ bhinnajātīyaṃ kiñcid vidyata ity anantaraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:544: tathā bāhyam anyan na vidyata ity abāhyaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:545: aparaṃ kāryam asya na vidyata ity anaparaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:546: sabāhyābhyāntaro hy ajaḥ saindhavaghanavat prajñānaghana ityarthaḥ //26//
GV05agsas_1u:548: sarvasya praṇavo hy ādir madhyam antas tathaiva ca /
GV05agsas_1u:549: evaṃ hi praṇavaṃ jñātvā vyaśnute tad anantaram // MandUpK_1.27 //
GV05agsas_1u:552: evaṃ hi praṇavamātmānaṃ māyāvyādisthānīyaṃ jñātvā tatkṣaṇādeva tad ātmabhāvaṃ vyaśnuta ity arthaḥ //27//
GV05agsas_1u:554: praṇavaṃ hīśvaraṃ vidyāt sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitam /
GV05agsas_1u:555: sarvavyāpinam oṃkāraṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // MandUpK_1.28 //
GV05agsas_1u:556: sarvaprāṇijātasya smṛtipratyayāspade hṛdaye sthitam īśvaraṃ praṇavaṃ vidyāt sarvavyāpinaṃ vyomavad oṃkāram ātmānam asaṃsāriṇaṃ dhīro buddhimān matvā na śocati /
GV05agsas_1u:562: oṃkāro vidito yena sa munir netāro janaḥ // MandUpK_1.29 //
GV05agsas_1u:564: mīyate 'nayeti mātrā paricchittiḥ sānantā yasya sa anantamātraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:567: oṃkaro yathā vyākhyāto vidito yena sa paramārthatatvasya mananān muniḥ /
